persons.description: CEO is a chief executive officer, the highest-rankig corporate officer (executive) or administrator in an organisation.
Project managers have the responsibility of the planning, procurement and execution of a project, in any undertaking that has a defined scope, defined start and a defined finish.
A developer or computer programmer programs computers or designs the system to match the requirements of a systems analyst.
Human resource management (HRM) is the strategic approach to the effective management of people in a company or organization such that they help their business gain a competitive advantage.
